Most retailers need to use a payment processor. Coinbase and Bitpay are the crypto payment processors that most retailers seem to use. Those payment providers are the ones who decide which crypto will be accepted. Bitpay merchants can now accept # BitcoinCash.

Ripple is not in beta. After 6 successful years, rippled version 1.0.0 was released in May. Wallet providers and businesses that need to connect to the XRP Ledger should be running their own servers. Ripple is a private company and does not provide free services.
